title: The Soldier of the Ming Dynasty - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Hot-blooded Protagonist   Kingdoms   Male Protagonist   Military   Reincarnation   Wars
author: Zhi Hua Chuan   纸花船
description: Li Yuanqing is an ordinary soldier, no different than any other person. However, only he knows; he comes from hundreds of years in the future. Since his fiancée majored in history, he knows about the history of this period. The Ming Dynasty will fall from power soon. He wants to run away, but he cannot because of an injury. Will he survive?>
